metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10074 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
The mail transport (aka Swift_Transport_MailTransport) in Swift Mailerbefore 5.4.5 might allow remote attackers to pass extra parameters to themail command and consequently execute arbitrary code via a \" (backslashdouble quote) in a crafted e-mail address in the (1) From, (2) ReturnPath,or (3) Sender header.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10074` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libphp-swiftmailer - 5.4.2-1.1
php-swiftmailer - 5.4.2-1.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libphp-swiftmailer package in esm-apps/focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.4.2-1.1').
